summary: Nick, a young Boston Italian, trying to find purpose in the ideology of the mafia and finding his world turned upside down.
cast: Ben Barnes|Leighton Meester|Slaine|Ritchie Coster|Toby Jones|Harvey Keitel|Paul Ben-Victor|Kenny Wormald|Jay Giannone|Tully Banta-Cain|William Bloomfield|Damien Di Paola|Armen Garo|Robert Masiello|Sasha Olson|Bobby Randall|Don Tempesta|Billy 'V' Vigeant|Brian A. White|William Xifaras|Michael Yebba|Jack Chausse|Billy Concha|Julie Ann Dawson|Mickey Gilmore|Jobian Herron|Ron Komora|Sarah Amber Newcomb|Stacey Queripel|Gary Roscoe|David Weindel
title: By the Gun
